dmca.title: DMCA Complaint from Playboy Modelsexplorer.com
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Cherkashina, Tatyana [mailto:TCherkashina@playboy.com] 
Posted At: Wednesday, September 13, 2006 2:00 PM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: DMCA Complaint from Playboy Modelsexplorer.com
Subject: RE: DMCA Complaint from Playboy Modelsexplorer.com


Dear Sirs,

Please be advised that the infringing content referenced in our below
complaint is still accessible.

Sincerely,

Tatyana Cherkashina

-----Original Message-----
From: legal-response@theplanet.com [mailto:legal-response@theplanet.com]

Sent: Tuesday, September 12, 2006 5:04 PM
To: Cherkashina, Tatyana; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: DMCA Complaint from Playboy Modelsexplorer.com

To Whom It May Concern:

This letter confirms that access to the materials referenced in your
below-pasted complaint has been disabled.

Legal Response Team
The Planet



---------


From: Cherkashina, Tatyana [mailto:TCherkashina@playboy.com] Posted At:
Friday, September 01, 2006 9:31 AM Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: NOTICE OF COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT Modelsexplorer.com
(67.19.242.2)
Subject: NOTICE OF COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT Modelsexplorer.com
(67.19.242.2)
Importance: High


September 1, 2006
 
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. 
1333 North Stemmons Freeway
Suite 110
Dallas, TX 75207
US
 

Legal-response@theplanet.com

legalresponse@theplanet.com

 

Dear Sir or Madam:

It has been brought to our attention that web pages at
Modelsexplorer.com (67.19.242.2) display, without authorization,
reproductions of images owned by Playboy Enterprises International, Inc.
(???Playboy???). All right, title and interest in and to these images
belongs to Playboy.

I believe in good faith that the disputed images displayed on
Modelsexplorer.com (67.19.242.2) are not authorized by the copyright
owner, its agent or the law.

Accordingly, please remove the unauthorized reproductions of Playboy
copyrighted images on Modelsexplorer.com (67.19.242.2) and on all web
pages under your control. 

Examples of the copyrighted material can be found at the following
links:

http://modelsexplorer.com/

This link displays Playboy???s copyrighted content including but not
limited to the following models:

Cady Cantrell 
Candace Collins 
Candy Loving
Capri Cameron
Cara Michelle
Cara Wakelin
Cara Zavaleta
Carina Persson
Carina Ragnarsson
Carmella Decesare
Carmen Berg
Carmen Electra
Carol Eden
Carol Ficatier
Carol Imhof
Carol O'neal
Carol Vitale
Carol Willis
Carrie Enwright 
Carrie Jean Yazel 
Carrie Radison
Carrie Stevens
Carrie Westcott
Cassandra Lynn
Cathy Larmouth
Charis Boyle
Charlotte Kemp
Cherie Witter
Cheryl Bachman
Cheryl Kubert
China Lee
Chris Cranston
Christa Speck
Christi Shake
Christi Taylor
Christina Ferguson
Christina Leardini
Christina Santiago
Christina Smith
Christine Maddox
Christine Richters
Christine Smith
Christine Williams
Cindy Brooks
Cindy Brown
Colleen Farrington
Colleen Marie
Colleen Shannon
Connie Brighton
Connie Cooper
Connie Gauthier
Connie Kreski
Connie Mason 
Cori Nadine
Corinna Harney
Courtney Rachel Culkin
Crista Nicole
Cristy Thom
Crystal Smith
Cyndi Wood
Cynthia Brimhall
Cynthia Hall
Cynthia Myers



Please be advised that this is only a small sampling of the infringing
material that is displayed on this website. The website has a statement
that it contains more than 1480 models and more than 63100 pictures.
Additionally, most of the images have Playboy???s trademarks (ie.
PLAYBOY, PLAYMATE, MISS [MONTH], CENTERFOLD and CYBER GIRL) displayed.
We believe there is a way for you to identify postings that are likely
an infringement and have them removed. We would be interested in working
with you in an effort to decrease the amount of infringing Playboy
material on this website. Please contact me at the number or email below
if you would be willing to discuss this issue.

 

I, Tatyana Cherkashina, under penalty of perjury, am authorized to act
on behalf of Playboy Enterprises International, Inc. in regard to the
above-mentioned unauthorized reproduction of the Playboy copyrighted
images. My contact information is as follows: Playboy Enterprises
International, Inc., 680 N. Lake Shore Drive, Chicago, Illinois 60611,
Fax 312-266-2042, phone 312-373-2314, E-mail address is
tcherkashina@playboy.com.

We look forward to hearing from you and resolving this matter
immediately.

This letter is not intended to and shall not waive or prejudice any
rights and remedies that Playboy may have at law, in equity or
otherwise. Any and all such rights and remedies are hereby expressly
reserved.



PLAYBOY ENTERPRISES INTERNATIONAL, INC.

Tatyana Cherkashina

Intellectual Property Assistant 

 

cc: Ana Cashman, Esq.
